spec_data.Name: ddiskit
spec_data.Description:
Ddiskit is a little framework for simplifying creation of proper
Driver Update Disks (DUD) used for providing new or updated out-of-tree
kernel modules.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 17 Oct 2017 07:32:25 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Tool for Red Hat Enterprise Linux Driver Update Disk creation
